description: This joke highlights the amusing play on words involving whiteboards being 'remarkable', both in their utility and as a pun.
title: The Remarkable Whiteboard
n_1: Tom enters the office, holding a whiteboard marker with an air of excitement.
n_2: Tom draws a big, cheerful smiley on the whiteboard.
n_3: Sarah leans in, looking at the whiteboard curiously.
n_4: Both burst into laughter at the pun, enjoying the moment.
c1_1: Check out what I can do with this!
c1_3: See, you can erase and rewrite, it's remarkable!
c2_3: Oh, I see what you did there!
c1_4: It's a great whiteboard, isn't it?
